params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.app_profile
params.description: Required. The app profile which will (partially) replace the current value.

params.name: data.update_mask
params.description: Required. The subset of app profile fields which should be replaced. If unset, all fields will be replaced.

params.name: data.ignore_warnings
params.description: If true, ignore safety checks when updating the app profile.
